privates.name: Dalkey Atmospheric Railway
privates.description: No Corporation can build in the Wicklow hex until this company is bought by a Corporation or closed.

privates.name: Donegal Railway
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place two connected narrow gauge yellow tiles in the Donegal hex and on adjacent hex. This action closes the company.

privates.name: Board of Works
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place a yellow tile without payment of terrain costs. The company closes once this ability has been used twice.

privates.name: City of Dublin Steam Packet Company
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place the +£10 token on any port. This action closes the company, but the Corporation adds £10 to the port’s revenue until the end of the game.

privates.name: Tralee & Dingle Railway
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place two connected narrow gauge yellow tiles in the Tralee and Dingle hexes. This action closes the company.

privates.name: Drumglass Colliery Railway
privates.description: No Corporation can build in the DCR hex until this company is bought by any Corporation or closed. The owning Corporation can then place a yellow tile in that hex without using a tile action or paying terrain costs.

privates.name: Trans-Atlantic Steam Packet Station
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place the +£20 token on Galway. This action closes the company, but the Corporation adds £20 to the city’s revenue until the end of the game.

privates.name: River Shannon Shipping Co
privates.description: The owning Corporation controls a river link between Dromod and Limerick and adds the value of the other city to one train ending at either Dromod or Limerick.

privates.name: William Dargan Esq.
privates.description: The owning Corporation can upgrade a second track tile during each OR at a cost of £30 from the Corporation’s Treasury.

privates.name: The Irish Mail
privates.description: The owning Corporation can place an off-board location tile adjacent to one of: Londonderry, Kingstown, or Waterford. This action closes the company, but any Corporation may run to the tile for the rest of the game.

privates.name: Dublin & Kingstown Railway
privates.description: The owner of this company: Takes the D&KR directorship; sets the share price at half bid; places a 2H-Train on the charter; places the winning bid in the D&KR treasury less the cost of the train and discards this card.

notes.note: IPO shares pay dividends to the corporation. Shares in the market do not pay.
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares cannot be sold during the first stock round

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit
